Luke: Now each year at the feast Pilate was obligated to release one prisoner for the people.
John: For at times an angel would go down into the pool and stir up the water. The first person who stepped in after the water was stirred up was healed of whatever disease he had.

Romans: Now to him who is able to establish you according to my gospel and the proclamation of Jesus Christ, according to the revelation of the mystery that has been kept silent since the world began but has now been revealed, and through the prophetic Scriptures has been made known to all the Gentiles, according to the commandment of the eternal God, to bring about the obedience of faith— to the only wise God be glory forever through Jesus Christ. Amen.
II Corinthians: the Lord Jesus Christ, the love of God, and the fellowship of the Holy Spirit be with you all.
